text:
Today we restate our commitment to understanding and finding solutions to the numerous forms of inequality that communities of color experience.  #Juneteenth

Join us next week as we continue our Economic Inequality series, focused on housing security in the wake of #COVID19. https://t.co/rUKDI6wuqK

entity.name: Juneteenth
entity.description: Juneteenth, the holiday commemorating the day that all enslaved people in the US learned they were free, is being celebrated this year with marches, music and more.
